sentence: Fig. 1 shows the data of the participant's demographic characteristics.

Open in a new tab
Participant's demographic characteristics.Both HUTSTG and LUTSTG groups consisted of 64 pre-school children; the number of genders (male and female) and age (five years and six years) was also balanced between the groups (as shown in Fig. 2.1 and Fig. 2.2).
Fig. 2.3–2.6 show the data on the number of siblings, mother's age, mother's educational level and household income for HUTSTG and LUTSTG group.

Fig. 1 shows the data of the participant's demographic characteristics.

Both HUTSTG and LUTSTG groups consisted of 64 pre-school children; the number of genders (male and female) and age (five years and six years) was also balanced between the groups (as shown in Fig. 2.1 and Fig. 2.2).
Fig. 2.3–2.6 show the data on the number of siblings, mother's age, mother's educational level and household income for HUTSTG and LUTSTG group.
